alert.note: Alert for Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Madison River Valley; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 7:23PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Madison, southeastern Beaverhead and southeastern Gallatin Counties through 830 PM MDT... At 723 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles north of Gardiner to near Spencer. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and an intense burst of snow reducing visibility to one-half mile or less. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West Yellowstone, Monida, Lakeview, Yellowstone Village, Targhee Pass, Raynolds Pass and Monida Pass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
